dialogs.clearConfirmMessage: This will permanently delete the database, vectors, and temp files. The app will then restart.
dialogs.clearDoneMessage: All application data has been cleared. The app will now restart.
dialogs.clearFailedMessage: Failed to clear all data. Please check logs for details.

setup.stepOneDescription: Choose a folder and confirm the recommended structure.
setup.stepThreeDescription: Create the directory structure and complete the setup.

form.pageDescription: View and manage files imported into the system

descriptions.llmProvider: Choose which LLM provider to use for directory suggestions and analysis.

hints.emptyDirectory: You can pick an empty folder and let the AI create a directory structure for you.
hints.existingDirectory: You can also use an existing folder and skip the directory creation step.

messages.fetchPresetSuccess: Loaded preset directory structure from local configuration
messages.fetchError: Failed to fetch the directory structure
messages.emptyDirectoryReady: Selected directory is empty. AI can create the structure for you.
messages.skipCreateSuccess: Setup completed using the existing directory structure.
messages.finalizeError: Failed to save setup configuration. Please try again.
messages.directoryHasItems: This directory already contains {count} items. You can skip directory creation if the layout fits your needs.
messages.directoryIsEmpty: This directory is empty and ready for AI to generate the structure.

dialogs.existingStructureContent: The selected folder ({path}) already contains {count} items. Do you want to skip directory creation and finish setup instead?

professionPurposes.softwareEngineer: Organize project source code, design documents, technical notes, and deployment scripts.
professionPurposes.lawyer: Store case files, legal research, contracts, and client correspondence.
professionPurposes.teacher: Manage lesson plans, lecture notes, student assignments, and grading records.
professionPurposes.student: Organize study notes, assignments, research papers, and project files.
professionPurposes.projectManager: Keep project plans, timelines, meeting notes, requirements, and reports.
professionPurposes.contentCreator: Store drafts, media assets, scripts, publication schedules, and project briefs.
professionPurposes.designer: Manage research, design concepts, working files, client feedback, and final deliverables.

errors.textConversionFailed: Failed to convert file to text

common.llmUnavailable: LLM service is unavailable, please try again later

descriptions.themeFollowSystem: Automatically switch between light and dark to match the operating system.
descriptions.enablePreview: Double-click files to preview them before opening the default app.
descriptions.autoSaveRAG: Automatically add imported files to the RAG knowledge base.
descriptions.autoTagEnabled: Automatically extract tags for files during import or processing.
descriptions.tagSummaryMaxLength: Maximum characters used when generating tag summaries (affects auto-tagging).
descriptions.autoClassify: Skip confirmation dialogs when saving files to recommended directories.
descriptions.checkFileNameOnImport: Validate file names during import and block the process when they contain invalid patterns or unclear naming.
descriptions.enableDirectoryWatcher: Watch the workspace folder for new files and queue them for automatic import.
descriptions.useLocalService: When enabled, use the local Python service (typically http://localhost:8000). When disabled, you can configure a remote API URL.
descriptions.workDirectory: The workspace folder is defined during setup. Re-run the setup wizard to change it.
descriptions.apiBaseUrl: Base URL of this program's web service.
descriptions.llmProvider: Applies to intelligent directory suggestions, embeddings, and chat analysis.
descriptions.pegaApiKey: Stored securely in config.json. Update it by signing in below when it expires.
descriptions.pegaMode: Choose which backend the Pega platform should use for LLM requests.
descriptions.providerConfigPages: Open dedicated pages to manage credentials and defaults for each provider.

messages.apiError: Failed to update API base URL
messages.clearConfirmContent: This will delete imported files, database records, and chat history. This action cannot be undone.
messages.clearException: An unexpected error occurred while clearing data.
messages.themeUpdateFailed: Failed to switch theme. Please try again.
messages.pegaLoginRestriction: 未登录用户大语言模型调用频率有限制
messages.pegaFetchUserFailed: Failed to load Pega account information.
messages.pegaUnauthorized: Session expired. Please sign in again.
messages.pegaStatusCredentialHint: Sign in to load the Pega API key before checking status.
messages.pegaStatusMissingCredential: No API key or token available. Sign in first.
messages.pegaStatusUnauthorized: Authentication failed when contacting Pega. Sign in again.
messages.pegaStatusFetchFailed: Failed to load Pega service status.
messages.themeControlledBySystem: Theme follows your system appearance. Disable following to change it manually.
messages.themeFollowSystemUpdateFailed: Failed to update the follow-system preference. Please try again.

placeholders.name: How should we address you?
placeholders.description: Describe what happened or what you expect

descriptions.screenshotHint: Attach up to 3 images (PNG or JPG), each under 5 MB.
descriptions.logsHint: Logs help us troubleshoot issues and do not include personal content.

messages.notInitialized: Feedback service is not ready yet.

errors.imageTooLarge: Each screenshot must be smaller than 5 MB.
errors.logsUnavailable: Unable to attach logs right now. Please try again later.
errors.submitFailed: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.

common.restoredDefaults: Default values applied. Save to persist.
common.envHint: Environment variables override these fields if defined at startup.

ollama.title: Ollama configuration
ollama.description: Update the local Ollama gateway endpoint and default models.

apiKey.label: API key
apiKey.placeholder: Leave blank when no key is required

openai.title: OpenAI configuration
openai.description: Provide organization credentials and preferred models for OpenAI.

openrouter.title: OpenRouter configuration
openrouter.description: Connect to OpenRouter and pick preferred hosted models.

bailian.title: Alibaba Bailian configuration
bailian.description: Configure Bailian credentials and default models.

transformerjs.title: Transformer.js Local Model Configuration
transformerjs.description: Use Transformer.js to run large language models locally without external APIs. Models will be automatically downloaded to local cache.

chatModel.label: Chat model
chatModel.extra: Default model: Xenova/LaMini-Flan-T5-783M (small text generation model)

embedModel.label: Embedding model
embedModel.extra: Default embedding model: Xenova/all-MiniLM-L6-v2 (lightweight embedding model)

visionModel.label: Vision model
visionModel.extra: Default vision model: Xenova/vit-gpt2-image-captioning (image captioning model)

cacheDir.label: Cache directory
cacheDir.placeholder: Leave empty for default location (program directory/models)
cacheDir.extra: Optional: specify model cache directory, leave empty to use the models folder under program execution directory

pegaAuth.description: Sign in or register to retrieve your API key for the Pega LLM gateway.

status.notice: After a successful login your workspace automatically switches to the Pega provider.

messages.registerSuccess: Registration successful. You can now sign in.
messages.loginFailed: Login failed. Check your credentials and try again.
messages.logoutConfirmMessage: Signing out removes the saved API key and token for the Pega provider.
messages.logoutFailed: Sign out failed. Please try again.
